org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting

Interface LayoutingAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Operator, UnaryBaseGraphToBaseGraphOperator<LogicalGraph>, UnaryBaseGraphToValueOperator<LogicalGraph,LogicalGraph>, UnaryGraphToGraphOperator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CentroidFRLayouter, CombiLayouter, FRLayouter, FusingFRLayouter, RandomLayouter, SamplingFRLayouter

    public interface LayoutingAlgorithm
extends UnaryGraphToGraphOperator
    Interface for all Layouters. A LayoutAlgorithm layouts a graph (assignes a position in 2D-space to each vertex in a graph). Layouted graphs can be converted to images using ImageDataSink.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String X_COORDINATE_PROPERTY
      The name of the property where the X-Coordinate of a vertex is stored

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        LogicalGraph execute(LogicalGraph inputGraph)
        Layouts the given graph. After layouting all vertices will have two new properties: X: the assigned x-coordinate
        Y: the assigned y-coordinate
        Specified by:
        execute in interface UnaryBaseGraphToValueOperator<LogicalGraph,LogicalGraph>
        Parameters:
        inputGraph - The graph to layout
        Returns:
        The input-graph, but every vertex now has X and Y coordinates as properties
